segments.text: Hi , I'd like to return this radio .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All right . Do you have the receipt ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: May I ask why you're returning the radio ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It does not work very well .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Would you like to exchange it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No . I'd just like a refund .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Certainly . This will take only a few seconds .
segments.speaker: S2
